content: My name is Sergio and I'm a research engineer. I've been tinkering with Rust for the last year on personal projects and I am very pleased with it. Right now I'm studying a master on HPC and I'm doing a course on compiler optimizations. I have to work on a optimization of my choice and I would like to ask if there is some optimization on literature that rustc developers would like to try. I would like to help a lil with an implementation.
Hi @Sergio Sánchez! You may want to join #t-compiler/wg-mir-opt.
Thx @bjorn3 ! I will look for what is cooking up there
I study for HPC too :wave:
